name: Giant Bomb Mailbagger: Anniversary Edition
description:
It's Giant Bomb's 10th Anniversary, and the celebratory mailbags are rolling in. Help the crew out by placing packages into the drop-off points for the East and West coasts, while regular-ass packages can go straight in the trash.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move.
  • Mouse to look.
  • Left click to pick up packages, and again to throw.
